name: Fireworks!
description:
Happy New Year!

In this game you have to connect as many spheres as you can to make them bigger and pop them! After that, you'll load your firework and launch it to the sky!

This is a small puzzle game created in four days. I tried to do my best and I concentrated myself on the animations... Hope you like it!

If you liked the game, you can make a donation, or simply share it!
